definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
pityriasis versicolor (aka tinea versicolor), blotchy skin condition common in tropical areas, common name 汗斑

sentences.english: To observe clinical observation on the treatment of tinea versicolor with Quxuan medicinal liquor.
sentences.chinese: 观察自制中药祛癣方治疗花斑癣的临床疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect and safety of 2% ketoconazole lotions in the treatment of tinea versicolor.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察2%酮康唑洗剂治疗花斑癣的疗效及安全性。

sentences.english: McGonagall is an Animagus who can turn into a tabby cat at will.
sentences.chinese: 麦格是一个可以随意变成一只花斑猫的阿尼马格斯。

sentences.english: From my own goat, the piebald one.
sentences.chinese: 我自己的羊，就是那只花斑的。

sentences.english: Skin biopsies from lesions resembling pityriasis versicolor showed characteristics of human papillomavirus infection.
sentences.chinese: 花斑癣状病灶之组织病理检查呈典型病毒感染表现。

sentences.english: The Clown Triggerfish or Big-spotted Triggerfish is one of the most spectacular looking marine species.
sentences.chinese: 花斑拟鳞鲀是其中一种有著非常美丽外表的海水鱼。

sentences.english: A tiger has a striped coat.
sentences.chinese: 老虎身上有条纹，而豹有花斑。

sentences.english: The fourth and fifth were also spotted black and white.
sentences.chinese: 第四只和第五只也是黑白色的花斑小狗。

definition: dark spot or blotch on the skin
(of an animal) appearance or color of coat
white hair (of animals)/see also 白髮|白发[bai2 fa4]
brown/gray or dark color/coarse hemp cloth/Taiwan pr. [he2]
